籤詩版本二:
Akazviwisira mugedhi retorii rakanga rakavezwa pasi pedombo kuti amudzosere murume.
Ndiani angachiwana kana ukaronga nokukurumidza, hakuna munhu anofamba nenyika.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi inokanda mufananidzo weshiri yebhuronzi padombo.
Chiratidzo cherombo rakanaka mune zvese.
解曰: Idya pasina hove. Kuva wakachena uye kufara murombo. Mirira Tetra Pak. Simba nevanhu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kunaka kunosangana naJehovha
MuTang Dynasty, Xue Li (614-683), zita rekuremekedza Rengui, akaberekerwa muLongmen, Jiangzhou (zvino Hejin, Shanxi).
Xue Rengui akapinda muchiuto katatu, achingoshanda semusoja wechikafu.
Apo Emperor Taizong (Li Shimin) weTang Dynasty akatandaniswa naGaisu, aive munjodzi uye akanunurwa naRengui.
Kureva kuti, akanzi marshal naEmperor Taizong weTang Dynasty, akatungamira mauto kumabvazuva, uye akawana zvakawanda zvechiuto.
聖意: Mumba haazvinakirwe.Inofadza.Inofadza.Inoshura.Inonetsa kuwana rombo rakanaka.Kutengeserana kunonetsa.Kuroora kunowanikwa.Liujia yakachengeteka.Vanhu vari pedyo neminda.Makonye esirikoni. yakakasira kudyarwa Zvipfuyo zvitanhatu zvaparara vanhu vashaikwa mhosva dzeveruzhinji dzinopembedzwa.Kutama kune nhamo.Zvinhu zvakarasika zvine mutsindo.Zvirwere zvawanikwa.Tumirai kuguva kugomo kunorugare.
